about_the_game:
Meet new rivals and meet your real-life goals in this gacha-style visual novel filled to the brim with loveable characters and amusing story threads.

Rival Goals is a visual novel in which characters are unlocked by setting and completing customizable daily tasks by your chosen deadline. These tasks are meant for you to complete in real-life and self-report to each of your in-game rivals in order to unlock more story, new characters, customizable decorations, collectibles, and more.

You can even create your own custom rivals to hold you to your promises to build better habits!


Featuring:

-25 unlockable characters
-A custom character builder
-Hundreds of collectibles
-Amusing storylines and secrets to uncover
-In-game to-do list to help manage your tasks
-Stickers for decorating your in-game desk

Whether you've been meaning to drink more water, get better sleep, or spend a few minutes everyday working on that book you're (supposed to be) writing, Rival Goals can be the push you finally needed to make your dreams come true!
